verse:
एष हि द्रष्ट स्प्रष्टा श्रोता घ्राता रसयिता मन्ता बोद्धा कर्ता विज्ञानात्मा पुरुषः।
स परेऽक्षर आत्मनि संप्रतिष्ठते ॥

terms.glossary: एष: Thisहि: certainlyद्रष्टा: seerस्प्रष्टा: toucherश्रोता: hearerघ्राता: smellerरसयिता: tasterमन्ता: thinkerबोद्धा: knowerकर्ता: doerविज्ञानात्मा: the self of knowledgeपुरुषः: personस: heपरे: in the supremeअक्षर: immutableआत्मनि: in the selfसंप्रतिष्ठते: is situated

meaning: Certainly, this person is the seer, the toucher, the hearer, the smeller, the taster, the thinker, the knower, the doer, the self of knowledge. He is situated in the supreme immutable self.
